note:
"Be Excellent To Everyone & Don't Feed The Trolls"

I'm me, you're you. 'nuff said.
WHO you are is NEVER a problem, how you BEHAVE usually is.
Dogs I don't care how they behave (within reason), they're dogs.
Brit in the UK.
Dyspraxia: I express myself badly.
Hard Of Hearing.
Physically Handicapped (long list).
+ Autoimmune problems, probably RA.
Hypertension is new though.

99% of comments are snark, other 101% - sleep deprivation.
ALL channelling rage constructively, it's this or scream at the Television.

I repost/boost a lot, emoji react even more.
If you get a "like" on Masto etc, it's probably an emoji you cannot see.

#NoIndex #NoBot #NoBridge

Of A Certain Age chronologically, physically older.
Weirdbird, Weirder SOH.
Left Hander, Plant-Based*, Old School Greenie,
Androgynous Demisexual / Dyke,
She / Her / Hers / Herself etc... But I HATE Labels.
Eternally Curious about everything, mainly Science, Art, Classics, Ecology, Wild Flora & Fauna, DOGGOS!

Songs to get an idea of me from:
Phranc's "Dress Code"
k.d. lang's "Luck In My Eyes"
Cass Elliot "Make Your Own Kind Of Music"
Shirley Bassey singing "I Am What I Am"

Disability Pride Month is July,
it follows Rainbow Pride Month in June.
I'm not in a wheelchair yet, so do not use the symbol.

*NOT a Triffid, Krynoid or Vervoid; I am MUCH more intemperate.

Avatar is a wolf howling at the moon

value: Bio filled in please, gibberish fine
